title: "AI-enabled drones will tell human teams where to find marine debris"
excerpt: "Marine debris is a huge problem, both when it's floating at sea and when it gets washed up on the shore. In order to locate the latter for removal, scientists are now developing artificially intelligent drones which will spot human-made beach trash from the air."
